name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 050
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By,To The Moon, a special piece only available to collectors who collected one of the first 49 pieces, because together I'm taking you all To The Moon
